questions.que: You're in a Dungeon and a Mysterious Figure Suddenly Appears and Says Hello. How Do You React?

optionsAndTraits.ans: A) Charge at them with your weapon drawn!
B) Analyze their body language and intentions.
C) Use stealth to hide and observe them.
D) Team up and ask, "Do you know the way out?"
E) Try to negotiate or trade with them.
F) Cast an illusion to distract them and escape.

questions.que: How Do You Usually Like to Spend Your Free Time?

optionsAndTraits.ans: A) Engaging in physical activities or sports.
B) Diving into a good book or solving complex puzzles.
C) Planning the ultimate prank on your best friend.
D) Volunteering at a local animal shelter or food bank.
E) Creating art or music.
F) Traveling and exploring new places.

questions.que: You Discover a Hidden Door in Your Grandfather's Study. What Do You Do Next?

optionsAndTraits.ans: A) Kick it open and explore what's inside.
B) Alert the authorities or experts about the discovery.
C) Dare a friend to go in first.
D) Seal it back up to prevent any potential danger.
E) Take photos and research its history.
F) Call a family meeting to discuss it.

questions.que: If You Were to Stumble Upon a Magical Artifact, What Kind of Companion Would You Wish for?

optionsAndTraits.ans: A) A fierce dragon to amplify your newfound powers.
B) A wise mentor to guide you in using the artifact responsibly.
C) A mischievous imp to keep things unpredictable.
D) A guardian angel to protect you.
E) A talking animal to find hidden treasures.
F) A shape-shifting friend to adapt to any situation.

questions.que: Imagine You're Offered a One-Time Chance to Gain a Superpower, But It Comes With a Price. What Do You Choose?

optionsAndTraits.ans: A) Super Strength, but you can never lie again.
B) Telepathy, but you'll forget a cherished memory.
C) Invisibility, but you lose your sense of taste.
D) Healing powers, but you age twice as fast.
E) Time travel, but you can't change the past.
F) Telekinesis, but you can't speak for a day each time you use it.

questions.que: You teleport to a parallel universe and bump into your dream celebrity. What magical memento do you ask for?

optionsAndTraits.ans: A) A selfie that grants wishes!
B) A conversation captured in a magic crystal.
C) An enchanted autograph that boosts confidence.
D) A potion to relive this moment whenever you want.
E) A map to teleport between worlds!
F) Challenge them to a magical duel for eternal fame!

questions.que: A genie offers you three wishes. What's your first wish?

optionsAndTraits.ans: A) Infinite wealth.
B) World peace.
C) Superpowers.
D) Bringing a loved one back to life.
E) No wishes, it's too risky.
F) The power to speak all languages fluently.

questions.que: You're teleported into a virtual world where you can rewrite the game's code. What's your first 'patch'?

optionsAndTraits.ans: A) Code in a time-travel feature!
B) Create a secret level only you can access.
C) Remove all the game's obstacles. Easy win!
D) Add an AI companion for lonely players.
E) Introduce unpredictable plot twists.
F) Code in an Easter Egg that unlocks a dance-off mode!

questions.que: You wake up as a billionaire in a medieval fantasy realm. What's your grandest venture?

optionsAndTraits.ans: A) Build a dragon-protected fortress.
B) Establish a school of magic.
C) Create a teleporting network between realms.
D) Organize grand tournaments with mythical prizes.
E) Invest in alchemy to find the elixir of life.
F) Commission a fleet of airships for sky exploration.

questions.que: You can transform into a mythical creature for a cosmic adventure. Who do you become?

optionsAndTraits.ans: A) Dragon - To explore fiery nebulae!
B) Phoenix - To dance on the surface of stars!
C) Mermaid/Merman - To discover hidden ocean planets!
D) Centaur - To race on the rings of Saturn!
E) Griffin - To guard a cosmic treasure!
F) Kitsune - To master the art of illusions.
